org.xflatdb.xflat.db

Class EngineBase.Row

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xflatdb.xflat.db.EngineBase.Row
  • Enclosing class:
    EngineBase

    protected class EngineBase.Row
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents one row in the database. The row contains a set of EngineBase.RowData which represents the committed and uncommitted data in the row. The row data is mapped by its transaction ID.

    The Row should always be locked before any reading or modification of the data.

    • Method Detail

      • chooseMostRecentCommitted

        public EngineBase.RowData chooseMostRecentCommitted(Transaction currentTransaction,
                                           long transactionId)
        Chooses the most recent committed RowData that was committed before the given transaction. If the transaction is null, this will choose the most recent committed RowData globally. This is

        ALWAYS invoke this while synchronized on the Row.

        Parameters:
        currentTransaction - The current transaction, or null.
        transactionId - The transaction ID to use iff the current transaction is null. This is overwritten if the transaction is not null.
        Returns:
        The most recent committed RowData in this row, committed before the transaction.

      • chooseMostRecentCommitted

        public EngineBase.RowData chooseMostRecentCommitted(long snapshotId)
        Chooses the most recent committed RowData that was committed before the given transaction ID. This prevents dirty reads in a non-transactional context by having a synchronizing transaction ID which can be obtained from EngineTransactionManager.transactionlessCommitId()

        ALWAYS invoke this while synchronized on the Row.

        Parameters:
        snapshotId - The Transaction ID representing the time at which a snapshot of the data should be obtained.
        Returns:
        The most recent committed RowData in this row, committed before the given snapshot.

      • cleanup

        public boolean cleanup()
        Cleans up the transactional data in this row. Returns true if this row can then be removed because it contains no data.
        Returns:
        true if this row has no RowData or its only RowData is "nothing".
